title: geth 1.7.0 - BAD BLOCK - Number: 1744621 - Error: unknown ancestor
body:
#### System information
Geth version: Version: 1.7.0-stable (Megara)  
Architecture: amd64, Protocol Versions: [63 62], Network Id: 1, Go Version: go1.7.3, Operating System: linux  
Commit hash : 6c6c7b2af3efdad4d2f64f70f3a724af434bbcd2  
uname -a   
Linux ... 4.9.0-3-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.9.30-2+deb9u3 (2017-08-06) x86_64 GNU/Linux

#### Expected behaviour
that it syncs

#### Actual behaviour
it does - until block 1744620, then it goes into "bad block" psychosis, see below.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

compile Megara from clean clone:
```
cd ~/Documents/Code/github-ethereum
rm go-ethereum -rf

git clone --recursive git@github.com:ethereum/go-ethereum.git
cd go-ethereum

git checkout tags/v1.7.0
git submodule update --init

make

ln -s ~/Documents/Code/github-ethereum/go-ethereum/build/bin/geth ~/bin/
```
sync, like described here: https://github.com/ethereum/ropsten

```
geth --testnet --fast --bootnodes "enode://20c9ad97c081d63397d7b685a412227a40e23c8bdc6688c6f37e97cfbc22d2b4d1db1510d8f61e6a8866ad7f0e17c02b14182d37ea7c3c8b9c2683aeb6b733a1@52.169.14.227:30303,enode://6ce05930c72abc632c58e2e4324f7c7ea478cec0ed4fa2528982cf34483094e9cbc9216e7aa349691242576d552a2a56aaeae426c5303ded677ce455ba1acd9d@13.84.180.240:30303"
```

#### tail of logged output:

syncs fine until:
```
[...]
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Imported new state entries               count=884  elapsed=9.254ms   processed=18528335 pending=328   retry=2    duplicate=114 unexpected=2564
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Imported new state entries               count=149  elapsed=860.909µs processed=18528484 pending=0     retry=0    duplicate=114 unexpected=2564
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Imported new block receipts              count=0    elapsed=73.233µs  bytes=0        number=1744619 hash=f3242c…57f3c9 ignored=1
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Committed new head block                 number=1744619 hash=f3242c…57f3c9
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed=882.214µs mgasps=0.000 number=1744620 hash=6a7cc1…e93c1a
ERROR[09-25|19:49:41] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}

Number: 1744621
Hash: 0xfe43f27559d863308e7c83e531c8717acbb56afd1aae9b901ae42ae5bd3b9a5a


Error: unknown ancestor
##############################
 
WARN [09-25|19:49:41] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=20c9ad97c081d633 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
INFO [09-25|19:49:41] Fast sync complete, auto disabling 
INFO [09-25|19:49:44] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed=444.567µs mgasps=0.000 number=1744620 hash=6a7cc1…e93c1a
ERROR[09-25|19:49:45] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}

Number: 1744621
Hash: 0xfe43f27559d863308e7c83e531c8717acbb56afd1aae9b901ae42ae5bd3b9a5a


Error: unknown ancestor
##############################
 
WARN [09-25|19:49:45] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=6ce05930c72abc63 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
INFO [09-25|19:49:52] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed=603.416µs mgasps=0.000 number=1744620 hash=6a7cc1…e93c1a
ERROR[09-25|19:49:53] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
[...]
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}

Number: 1744621
Hash: 0xfe43f27559d863308e7c83e531c8717acbb56afd1aae9b901ae42ae5bd3b9a5a


Error: unknown ancestor
##############################
 
WARN [09-26|08:39:12] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=549987040b9e6f42 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
```
[... many more ...]
```
^CINFO [09-26|08:42:04] Got interrupt, shutting down... 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] IPC endpoint closed: /home/akrueger/.ethereum/testnet/geth.ipc 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] Blockchain manager stopped 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] Stopping Ethereum protocol 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] Ethereum protocol stopped 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] Transaction pool stopped 
INFO [09-26|08:42:04] Database closed                          database=/home/akrueger/.ethereum/testnet/geth/chaindata
```

size is over 5 gigs:

```
du /home/akrueger/.ethereum/testnet -d 0 -h
5.3G	/home/akrueger/.ethereum/testnet
```

(As you see above, manually killed geth, then) when I restarted geth, it continued to the tip of the chain:

```
INFO [09-26|09:10:53] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=1    mgas=3.940   elapsed=10.850ms  mgasps=363.125 number=1748899 hash=19d1c6…a04235
INFO [09-26|09:10:58] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=2    mgas=0.122   elapsed=5.373ms   mgasps=22.628  number=1748900 hash=cc8549…69f0f8
INFO [09-26|09:11:25] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=1    mgas=0.202   elapsed=4.164ms   mgasps=48.400  number=1748901 hash=690e72…f48933
INFO [09-26|09:11:34] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=0    mgas=0.000   elapsed=3.706ms   mgasps=0.000   number=1748902 hash=ba12d8…c32608
```

So - not a complete deal breaker, just an event which needs human interaction to fully sync.

Thanks for all the details. We've seen a similar log not long ago. Not sure yet where it originates from, but it definitely seems to be that fast sync doesn't properly "terminate" itself in some cases.

I've got probably the same issue. After fast sync completed the "unknown ancestor error" came up. I restarted geth 5 times and had always the same behaviour but on different blocks. But on the 6th try it suddenly worked. 

I started geth 1.7.0 with:

```
 ~/geth-linux-amd64-1.7.0-6c6c7b2a $ ./geth --testnet --rpc
```

And here is the log:

```
INFO [09-29|10:08:24] Block synchronisation started 
INFO [09-29|10:08:25] Imported new block headers               count=0 elapsed=9.386ms number=1768747 hash=cc1ffa…f8865a ignored=192
INFO [09-29|10:08:26] Imported new block headers               count=14 elapsed=40.167ms number=1768850 hash=9d3e74…666e49 ignored=89
INFO [09-29|10:08:26] Imported new state entries               count=0  elapsed=79.818µs processed=0 pending=1 retry=1 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:20] Imported new state entries               count=266 elapsed=443.025µs processed=266 pending=156 retry=0 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:35] Imported new state entries               count=352 elapsed=186.118µs processed=618 pending=870 retry=0 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:45] Imported new state entries               count=761 elapsed=2.384ms   processed=1379 pending=768 retry=0 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:53] Imported new state entries               count=735 elapsed=2.305ms   processed=2114 pending=248 retry=0 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:57] Imported new state entries               count=367 elapsed=1.485ms   processed=2481 pending=0   retry=0 duplicate=0 unexpected=19
INFO [09-29|10:11:57] Imported new block receipts              count=0   elapsed=10.606ms  bytes=0 number=1768556 hash=611754…160c3f ignored=1
INFO [09-29|10:11:57] Committed new head block                 number=1768556 hash=611754…160c3f
ERROR[09-29|10:11:57] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}

Number: 1768558
Hash: 0x0de74ffd2e83e06c0d50e7490e15343346323e1cd4414815b19786c9d5a512bf


Error: unknown ancestor
##############################
 
WARN [09-29|10:11:57] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=6ce05930c72abc63 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
INFO [09-29|10:11:57] Fast sync complete, auto disabling 
ERROR[09-29|10:12:06] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}

Number: 1768558
Hash: 0x0de74ffd2e83e06c0d50e7490e15343346323e1cd4414815b19786c9d5a512bf


Error: unknown ancestor
##############################
 
WARN [09-29|10:12:06] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=edba28c6dd2abf1c err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
```
Fixed on master, will ship in the morning.
